name: The TAG-A-LONG Tote ((PDF Sewing Pattern))
description:
===================
PDF SEWING PATTERN 
===================

What a darling little tote! This sweet little bag has a deep interior pocket just big enough to carry everything you need.

There are two small pockets on the outside of the bag that are the perfect size to keep your credit card, cash etc. The pockets have a snap closure to ensure everything stays safely tucked inside.

This pattern is quick and simple. You could easily make a couple of these in an afternoon.

Have fun mixing and matching fabrics and colors. These make great gifts for your friends and family!

With this SEWING PATTERN, you’ll be able to make your very own Tag-a-Long Tote! I created this pattern with the beginner sewer in mind. 

For added clarity, this pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with fully illustrated instructions.

Finished size measures:

7.5" at it's widest point and 10.5" tall

This is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours of your purchase. (usually sooner)

SKILL LEVEL: Beginner

Enjoy!!

You may sell finished Tag-a-Long Totes made from this pattern as long as you give the pattern credit to "The Crochet Diva".

name: Accessory Case ((PDF Sewing Pattern))
description:
===================
PDF SEWING PATTERN 
===================

This stylish case is made to hold an iPod Touch, iPhone/ Droid or any similarly sized phone or MP3 player, etc. This case is lined with heavy felt to protect your device. A soft leather strap with a sturdy nickel closure keeps everything safe inside the case. 

Measurements:

Width 3.5" 

With this SEWING PATTERN, you’ll be able to make your very own Accessory Case. I created this pattern with the beginner sewer in mind.

This is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours of your purchase. (usually sooner)

SKILL LEVEL: (( SEW EASY)) Beginner

Enjoy!!

You may sell finished Accessory cases made from this pattern as long as you give the pattern credit to "The Crochet Diva".

Use it as makeup bag, or throw your credit cards and license in there and you have a great little travel clutch. This little clutch is fully lined and padded for durability and has a zipper closure to ensure all of your items stay safely tucked inside. 

With this SEWING PATTERN, you’ll be able to make your very own STYLISH Grab and Go Clutch! I created this pattern with the beginner/intermediate sewer in mind.

name: THE NEW YORKER Wristlet/Clutch ((PDF Sewing Pattern))
description:
===================
PDF SEWING PATTERN 
===================

Who doesn't day dream about having their own New York City loft, and running out on a friday night in your 3" heels and fabulous designer outfit to go meet your girlfriends for martinis?? OK, I will have to admit that I get caught in that little daydream a lot!

This is my version of that expensive looking little designer wristlet/clutch that you would love to have . . . if only it wasn't SO pricey!! 

This sassy little bag can be a wristlet, or if you choose, you can detach the wristlet strap, or simply tuck it inside to have a more formal looking clutch.

There is a zippered pocket on the back to stash some loose change, a few sticks of gum or that perfect shade of lipstick!

The inside has a large open space for all of your essentials and there is even an interior pocket as well.

OK, I think this may be my favorite part, on the inside of the flap I created two spots to snuggly hold your check card and license. You no longer need to fumble through your purse to find your license when the bartender asks (because you obviously don't look 21 =)

The fabric combinations are endless! What a great gift to make for all your sassy friends. Give them to your bridesmaids as gifts too, they will love them!

With this SEWING PATTERN, you’ll be able to make your very own New Yorker Wristlet/Clutch!

For added clarity, this pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with fully illustrated instructions.

This is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours of your purchase. (usually sooner)

SKILL LEVEL: Beginner/Intermediate

Measurements:
10" at the widest point
4.75" high
2" deep

Enjoy!!

Please feel free to make this pattern for yourself, for gifts or for charity but please do not sell the pattern or finished product. Thank you.

**CUSTOMER COMMENTS**

"I cannot wait to sew this wristlet!! The pattern looks very easy and self explainatory. The PDF arrived quickly. Thank you so much!"

"Very very quick turnaround. Thanks so much !!"

"Thank You! Cute Pattern"

"Fabulous!"
